item.description:
The big wall is calling (well, one can dream, right?)

Anyway, it's Mondays @ Metrorock meetup time again.

Beginner, or no partner? No problem, we've got you covered.

Experienced climber who wants to get pushed farther? We can cover that as well.

Want to lead? No problem, we got ropes with us (I think).

We will typically wait until about 7:10pm for everybody to arrive and team up. If you happen to come after we already hit the walls, just try to find us. There's a dry-erase board between the two locker rooms; if I remember, I will post a description of what I'm wearing on it so you can find us more easily.

Please note: you will need to pass a belay test if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You can take a belay test when you get there. If you have never climbed before, you should take a class at Metrorock. Please call the gym in advance to make arrangements to take the class. You can use the message board on this meetup to find other people that want to take the class. Metrorock will charge you $16 for a daypass if you are not already a member or a punch card holder. Ladies get a 50% discount on Monday nights!

The Monday night belay classes are filling up quickly, so sign up early.

See http://www.metrorock.... for directions.

The gym also has a shuttle to the gym from the T - Wellington Station if you don't have a car.

Please know that I may not make it to this event myself, so please meet up anyways, don't be shy and make new friends!
item.name: Mondays @ Metrorock
